channel.title: NPC help
channel.description:
soo, i was wondering....why are mai npc's moving through stuff?
I set the code to [code] spawn = 2571 2661 3307 0 2671 3317 2651 3294 2 Adrougne Market Guard [/code] and they end up walking thru the stalls like this : [IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v250/kennykid2002/own/rs.jpg[/img]
neone know how to fix it? (if there is a way?) thanks in advance btw, if it helps, i already tried setting the walking type to 1 instead of two, and then they dont even walk at all xD

item.description:
@Kennykid2002 wrote:

aite thanks for the quick reply, it was just kinda…annoying hehe

item.title: NPC help
item.dc:creator: @Kennykid2002 Kennykid2002
item.description:
@Kennykid2002 wrote:

soo, i was wondering…why are mai npc’s moving through stuff?

I set the code to

spawn = 2571	2661	3307	0	2671	3317	2651	3294	2	Adrougne Market Guard

and they end up walking thru the stalls like this :

rs.jpg768×554

neone know how to fix it? (if there is a way?) thanks in advance
btw, if it helps, i already tried setting the walking type to 1 instead of two, and then they dont even walk at all xD

Read full topic
